mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JOB_QRTZ_TRIGGER_REGISTRY WHERE update_time < sysdate - interval '${timeout}' SECOND
mapper.select: SELECT FROM JOB_QRTZ_TRIGGER_REGISTRY t WHERE t.update_time > sysdate - interval '${timeout}' SECOND
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_QRTZ_TRIGGER_REGISTRY(id, registry_group , registry_key , registry_value, update_time) VALUES( SEQ_JOB_COMMON.NEXTVAL, #{registryGroup} , #{registryKey} , #{registryValue}, sysdate)
